directions: Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat.  Add onion, and cook and stir for 3 minutes.  Add tomatoes, zucchini, and green pepper.  Stir.  Season to taste with salt and black pepper.  Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in rice and water.  Cover, and cook over low heat for 20 minutes.
ingredients: 2 pounds zucchini, peeled and cut into 1 inch thick slices
title: Zucchini-Tomato Saute
